name: Ctrl+Block+Delete
description:
#Controls
←↑↓→ or WASD to move
Left-click to shoot

#Story
Beware user! Grab your gas mask, hazmat suit, and hoverboard to surf the toxic web. There are many dangers to be wary of, but gathering friends can help.

#Gameplay
This is a top down bullet hell set inside the internet's social netspace. Fire back against the strange users of the internet. Dodge their vicious comments, snarks, and fire walls. Survive and gather friends to come out unscathed.
